components.oauth: Handles user authentication using OAuth2 with JWT tokens
components.ssl_offload: offloads SSL encryption from application servers, improving performance and security.

steps.planned: Implement OAuth2 with JWT tokens for secure authentication
steps.acted: Integrate Keycloak as the identity provider and use its built-in JWT token generation

steps.planned: Implement a load balancer to distribute traffic across multiple instances of the Keycloak server
steps.acted: Use HAProxy or NGINX as the load balancer, configure it to direct traffic to multiple Keycloak instances

steps.planned: Implement a load balancer with session persistence to ensure that users are directed to the same Keycloak instance for their entire session
steps.acted: Configure HAProxy or NGINX to use IP Hash or Cookie-based session persistence

components.oauth: Handles user authentication using OAuth2 with JWT tokens
components.ssl_offload: offloads SSL encryption from application servers, improving performance and security.

steps.planned: Implement Load Balancer with SSL Termination
steps.acted: Configure load_balancer to use SSL termination, ensuring all incoming requests are encrypted.
Configure session_persistence to use Redis as the session store, reducing load on the application and improving scalability.

steps.planned: Implement OAuth for secure user authentication
steps.acted: Configure oauth to handle user authentication, reducing the load on the auth component and improving security.

steps.planned: Implement Rate Limiter to prevent brute-force attacks
steps.acted: Configure rate_limiter to limit the number of requests from a single IP address, preventing abuse and improving security.

components.oauth: Handles user authentication using OAuth2 with JWT tokens
components.ssl_offload: offloads SSL encryption from application servers, improving performance and security.

steps.planned: Implement a Service Mesh for service discovery and traffic management
steps.acted: Add istio as a load balancer to provide fine-grained control over traffic routing and security

steps.planned: Implement a Web Application Firewall (WAF) to enhance security against common web attacks
steps.acted: Integrate OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set into the existing load balancer configuration

steps.planned: Implement a Cloud Native Application Protection Platform (CNAPP) to integrate security and compliance into the service mesh
steps.acted: Integrate Open Source CNAPP solution like Aqua or Check Point in the existing istio service mesh configuration

steps.planned: Implement a Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) Protection to enhance robustness and security
steps.acted: Integrate Open Source DDoS protection solution like NGINX or Cloudflare in the existing load balancer configuration
